    public class HeaterInternalControlOutboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements HeaterInternalControlCI
    The class HeaterInternalControlOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the HeaterInternalControlCI component interface.
